TEXT.TITLE: QUANTUM <QTMCU> RECEIVES PATENT NOTIFICATION
TEXT.BODY: Quantum Diagnostics Ltd said it received notification from the U.S. patent office that a patent would be issued on its analog image processor as of March three. Reuter
